can_do: I can narrate and describe in all major time frames.
prompt:
Language: Spanish (es)
Level: Intermediate High (IH)
Can-Do Statement: "I can narrate and describe in all major time frames."

ACTFL Intermediate High "Can-Do" → I can narrate and describe in all major time frames.

Generate 6 topical lessons focused on this Can-Do statement. Each lesson should:
- Have 8-12 flashcards 
- Use 85% high-frequency words (top 4,000), 15% function words
- Include practical, culturally relevant examples
- Provide an IPA pronunciation for each word
- Include a example sentence for each vocabulary word

Your JSON output must validate against the given schema. Format each lesson
as a distinct unit with a clear objective that builds toward the Can-Do goal.

Return a complete, valid JSON object conforming to the LessonBatch interface.

{
  "level_code": "IH",

  "lessons": [
    {

      "objective": "Learners will be able to describe childhood memories using the imperfect tense.",
      "cards": [
